title: PBE says that there is an error in my files
body:
...and that I have to repair my client.

I repaired my client and restarted yet this message keeps popping up whenever I try starting a game.

replies.body: Make sure that you're launching the client as admin so it's able to properly update and fix those game files. If that's not helping so far, go ahead and run that Full Repair option through the PBE client options for me and let me know how that helps.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xRQ4sE4T,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-20T00:43:49.959+0000)
>
> Make sure that you're launching the client as admin so it's able to properly update and fix those game files. If that's not helping so far, go ahead and run that Full Repair option through the PBE client options for me and let me know how that helps.

Just tried both, still same problem.
